snippet.title: Legion of Maelstrom Trailer
snippet.description:
"The Legion of Maelstrom," an homage and tribute to the golden era of gaming, is an adventure with unique mechanics, strategic character building, and challenging battles set in a desperate land of imminent destruction.

Level-Up your character while sharing mastered skills with other classes.
Farm enemies for equipment and weapons.
And attempt to silence the storm sorcerer, "Maelstrom."

Game by Andrew Riche,
Music by J.P. "shortcircuit" Pittet.
